## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style (TypeScript, existing patterns)
- [ ] I have run `npm run build` and it succeeds
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally (dev + worker)
- [ ] I have updated the README/docs if needed
